titleStmt.title: A treatise of the person of Christ and therein, a discourse about the knowledge of God, who and what a one He is. Of the Son of God, who and what a one He is. Of the first promise of Christ, & first publication of the mystery of Him. Of the times and years of the first fathers, &c. Of the account of years, from the creation to the flood, and from both to the first coming of Christ, and probably to His second coming. Of the evidences demonstrating that Jesus is the Christ. Of the mystery of Christ, as revealed since His first coming. Of election. By Thomas Moore, Senior.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Thomas, Senior.

titleStmt.title: A treatise of the person of Christ and therein, a discourse about the knowledge of God, who and what a one He is. Of the Son of God, who and what a one He is. Of the first promise of Christ, & first publication of the mystery of Him. Of the times and years of the first fathers, &c. Of the mystery of Christ, as revealed since His first coming. Of election. By Thomas Moore, Senior.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Thomas, Senior.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. C. for Livewel Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,
